paper_abstract: In this paper a simple method for multi-channel Active Noise Control (ANC) is introduced. The proposed structure is a combination of an adaptive FIR filter, based on the FXLMS algorithm, and the ALIGN algorithm resulting in a decoupled matrix for secondary path transfer function. This structure thus converts a multi-channel ANC system to decoupled systems which results in the reduction in computational load without affecting the convergence behavior of the FXLMS system.
paper_title: Design of decoupling active noise control systems
